titleStmt.title: An extracte of the determination, and censure of the doctours of the vniversities of Salamanca and Valledolid touching the vvarres of Ireland, and declaration of the Poape his breve concerning the same vvarres
titleStmt.author: Zumel, Francisco, 1540-1607. aut

notesStmt.note: Signed by Fr. Franciscus Zumel, Dean of the faculty of Divinity at the University of Salamanca, and 17 others.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
